titleInfo.title: 'File 29/2 Transfer of Responsibility for Gulf Affairs from Colonial Office to India Office'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a copy of a telegram (with covering letter) sent from the Secretary of State for the Colonies in London to the Political Resident in Bushire on 30 July 1933.The telegram informs the Political Resident that effective from 1 August 1933, the India Office will take over responsibility hitherto discharged by the Colonial Office 'in respect of Persian Gulf work including oil'.
